CustomField.description: Indicates if the user can have their time allocated to a project. Also used by the SchedulableCreateBlankTimesheets class to identify users who need a Timesheet created for them each week (Cloud Coach 19-OCT-10)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this box if this user needs to be assigned out to Project work and has a Cloud Coach license.
CustomField.label: Allocatable
